thread.section_title: The Natural Sapphire Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Natural Sapphire Company | www.thenaturalsapphirecompany.com
thread.title: Daniel
thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by Daniel

author: Daniel
title: Daniel
text:
Caitlyn at The Natural Sapphire Company is a real star! From start to end, it felt like I had a personal assistant helping me in this process. She really knows her stuff; all about the sapphires, cuts, settings, ring sizes, materials, etc.
It was a real joy and pleasure dealing with Caitlyn through this whole process/experience. She was patient with any queries and apprehensions of mine, helped me to come up with alternatives and provide her feedback and suggestions, and ultimately helped us to arrive at our ideal engagement ring.
The ring was even nicer than we expected, from all the pictures and renderings we were provided to gauge and ascertain the final look of the ring. The box is nothing short of awesome, super nicely done and very solid. And the ring is just beautiful. Very well made, with an extremely beautiful sapphire in the exact kind of colour/hue we wanted all along.
Thanks to The Natural Sapphire Company and Caitlyn for an amazing experience and helping us to create a wonderful custom sapphire engagement ring!
